00032    while((c = getopt(argc, argv, "C:c:d:h:i:np:r:w:j:tz:lg:")) != -1)
00033    {
00034       switch(c)
00035       {
00036          case 'C':
00037             memset(pCmdLineArgs->composing, 0, MAX_LEN);
00038             memcpy(pCmdLineArgs->composing, optarg, strlen(optarg));
00039             break;
00040          case 'c':
00041             memset(pCmdLineArgs->cropping, 0, MAX_LEN);
00042             memcpy(pCmdLineArgs->cropping, optarg, strlen(optarg));
00043             break;

00051             break;

00054             memcpy(pCmdLineArgs->output_io, optarg, strlen(optarg));
00055             break;

00057             pCmdLineArgs->nonblocking = 1;
00058             break;

00060             memset(pCmdLineArgs->output_pixfmt, 0, MAX_LEN);
00061             memcpy(pCmdLineArgs->output_pixfmt, optarg, strlen(optarg));
00062             break;
00063          case 'r':
00064             memset(pCmdLineArgs->frame_rate, 0, MAX_LEN);
00065             memcpy(pCmdLineArgs->frame_rate, optarg, strlen(optarg));
00066             break;
00067          case 'w':
00068             memset(pCmdLineArgs->output_width, 0, MAX_LEN);
00069             memcpy(pCmdLineArgs->output_width, optarg, strlen(optarg));
00070             break;
00071          case 'j':
00072             sscanf(optarg,"%d",&pCmdLineArgs->capture_count);
00073             break;
00074          case 't':
00075             pCmdLineArgs->timestamp = 1;
00076             break;

00080             break;

00082             pCmdLineArgs->livestream = 1;

00085             sscanf(optarg,"%d",&pCmdLineArgs->ganging_type);
00086             break;

00088             if(optopt == 'C' ||
00089                optopt == 'c' ||
00090                optopt == 'd' ||
00091                optopt == 'h' ||
00092                optopt == 'i' ||
00093                optopt == 'p' ||
00094                optopt == 'r' ||
00095                optopt == 'w' ||
00096                optopt == 'z' ||
00097                optopt == 'g')
00098             {
00099                CapError("Option '-%c' required an argument.\n", optopt);
00100             }
00101             break;
00102          default:
00103             return -1;
